concurrency.group: linux-binary-libtorch-cxx11-abi-${{ github.event.pull_request.number || github.ref_name }}-${{ github.ref_type == 'branch' && github.sha }}-${{ github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch' }}

steps.name: Runner health check system info
steps.run:
cat /etc/os-release || true
cat /etc/apt/sources.list.d/rocm.list || true
cat /opt/rocm/.info/version || true
whoami

steps.name: Runner health check GPU count
steps.run:
ngpu=$(rocminfo | grep -c -E 'Name:.*\sgfx')
if [[ "x$ngpu" != "x2" && "x$ngpu" != "x4" ]]; then
    echo "Failed to detect GPUs on the runner"
    exit 1
fi

steps.name: Runner health check disconnect on failure
Preserve github env variables for use in docker
Clean PyTorch checkout
steps.run:
# Remove any artifacts from the previous checkouts
git clean -fxd

steps.name: Clean pytorch/builder checkout
steps.run:
# Remove any artifacts from the previous checkouts
git clean -fxd

steps.name: Kill containers, clean up images
steps.run:
# ignore expansion of "docker ps -q" since it could be empty
# shellcheck disable=SC2046
docker stop $(docker ps -q) || true
# Prune all of the docker images
docker system prune -af
